name: Guess the Movie :- Funnier One
storyline:
its a funny trivia game that you can play during your free time or when the nature calls.
If you are a hollywood movie lover then this game is for you. In this you have to guess the movies on the basis of their plots being explained very badly (in a funny way ).
summary:
its a funny trivia game that you can play during your free time or when the nature calls.
If you are a hollywood movie lover then this game is for you. In this you have to guess the movies on the basis of their plots being explained very badly (in a funny way ).
Its my first go at the mobile game development and all kinds of suggestions and improvements are welcome.
